dualCard.note: Dual card variant (MC + AmEx) available on request with shared credit limit

renewalWaiver.waiverText: Spend ₹6,00,000 in an anniversary year for annual fee waiver for the subsequent year

addOnCard.note: Supplementary cards not eligible for insurance and lounge benefits

latePayment.calculation: Tiered based on outstanding (Total Amount Due minus Payment Received)

autoDebitReturn.note: 2% of Total Amount Due, minimum ₹500; additional ₹50+GST debited from savings account

educationPayment.note: 1% fee on education payments via third-party apps

walletLoad.note: 1% fee on wallet loads of ₹5,000 or more

existingRelationship.note: Pre-approved offers available for existing ICICI customers with Deposits + Investment Value (DIV) of ₹50,00,000

creditLimit.factors: Based on income, credit score, existing relationship with ICICI Bank, and repayment history
creditLimit.enhancementCriteria: Good repayment history for 6+ months; automatic enhancement possible

purchaseAPR.note: 3.75% per month (45% per annum) as per MITC Dec 2025

gracePeriod.note: Interest-free period varies from 18 to 48 days depending on transaction date; 3 days grace period after payment due date

minPayment.calculation: 5% of outstanding amount; includes any over-limit amount, EMI installments, and unpaid MAD from previous statements

cashAdvance.limitNote: 10% of credit limit up to ₹20,000 for first 180 days; increased at bank's discretion thereafter

domestic.note: 2 Reward Points per ₹100 spent on domestic retail (0.5% value)

international.note: 4 Reward Points per ₹100 spent on international (1% value)

utility.note: 1 Reward Point per ₹100 on utility and insurance payments

rewards.earningText: Earn 2 RP per ₹100 on domestic spends, 4 RP per ₹100 on international spends, 1 RP per ₹100 on utilities/insurance

exclusions.note: No reward points on transactions falling under excluded categories

utility.note: RP earned capped at ₹80,000 utility spend per statement cycle

insurance.note: RP earned capped at ₹80,000 insurance spend per statement cycle

groceryAndDepartmental.note: RP earned capped at ₹40,000 grocery/departmental spend per statement cycle

transportation.note: RP earned capped at ₹20,000 transportation spend per statement cycle

expiry.condition: From date of issuance of reward points

welcome.condition: Within 45 days of payment of joining fee
welcome.description: Welcome vouchers worth ₹13,000+ from Tata CliQ, EaseMyTrip, EazyDiner, Da Milano, and Croma

milestones.note: Earn 4,000 reward points on spending ₹4 lakhs in an anniversary year
Earn 2,000 reward points for every additional ₹1 lakh spent after crossing ₹4 lakh
Maximum 20,000 milestone reward points per anniversary year (requires ₹12 lakh spend)

rewards.milestoneExclusions: Rent, government, and education payments excluded from milestone spend calculation

travel.note: Standard domestic rate; international travel earns 4 RP per ₹100

online.note: All online transactions except excluded categories

groceries.note: Capped at ₹40,000 spend per statement cycle

utilities.note: 1 RP per ₹100; capped at ₹80,000 spend per statement cycle

insurance.note: 1 RP per ₹100; capped at ₹80,000 spend per statement cycle

rent.note: No rewards on rent payments; 1% fee applicable

bankPortal.name: iShop

iCash.note: iCash available for NetBanking transactions; 1 iCash = ₹1

bankPortal.note: 6X-12X reward points on iShop purchases; capped at 9,000 bonus points for Sapphiro card

partnerMerchants.note: No specific partner merchant accelerators outside iShop

redemption.bestOption: Flight/Hotel bookings via iShop at ₹1 = 1 point (for premium cards); vouchers at ₹0.25/point for Sapphiro

options.description: Flight, Hotel & Bus bookings via iShop

options.note: E-vouchers offer best value at ₹0.25 per point
Lower value; delivery within 10 working days
Cash redemption via customer care call at 080-40146444; credited within 7 days

redemptionChannels: ICICI Bank Rewards Portal via iMobile
Customer care (080-40146444 for cash, 1860-258-5000 for gifts)

transferPartners.note: ICICI Sapphiro does not have airline/hotel transfer partners. Reward points can only be redeemed via ICICI Bank Rewards program or iShop.

pooling.note: Points pooling across ICICI cards not available

rewards.specialLogic: Milestone rewards calculated on anniversary year basis; rent, government, and education payments excluded from milestone and fee waiver calculations

spendRequired.note: Spend ₹75,000 in preceding quarter to unlock 4 complimentary visits for the next quarter

domestic.dualCardNote: For dual card variants (MC + AmEx), 2 visits per quarter available for each variant separately

afterNov152024.note: For cards issued on or after November 15, 2024

beforeNov152024.spaAccess: 2 complimentary spa sessions at select domestic airports

spendRequired.note: No spend requirement for international lounge access

lounge.loungeAccessNote: Lounge access benefit available only for primary cardholder; ₹2 authorization charge at entry for Visa/MC/RuPay, Re.1 for AmEx

golf.courses: Select premium golf courses in India via Golftripz
golf.bookingProcess: Register at www.teetimes.golftripz.com with same email as ICICI Bank card
golf.creditTiming: Benefits credited by 10th of following month, valid for next 2 months
golf.note: 1 complimentary round/lesson per ₹50,000 spent, maximum 4 per month

movies.offer: Buy 1 Get up to ₹500 off on second ticket

spendRequirement.note: Starting Jan 15, 2026, spend ₹25,000 in preceding quarter to enjoy offer

movies.dualCardNote: For dual card variants, 1 free ticket per month available for each variant separately
movies.note: BOGO offer on movie tickets via BookMyShow; minimum 2 tickets purchase required

programs.name: ICICI Bank Culinary Treats Programme
programs.note: Check culinarytreats website or ICICI Bank Culinary Treats app for restaurant list

fuel.note: 1% surcharge waiver on fuel transactions up to ₹4,000; waiver applicable up to ₹50,000 spend per statement cycle; no reward points on fuel

dynamicCurrencyConversion.recommendation: Always decline DCC and pay in local currency

forex.note: Foreign currency markup of 3.5% applies to all non-INR transactions; refunds on forex transactions also attract 3.5% markup

concierge.note: Standard call charges apply for non-toll-free numbers

spa.condition: Only for cards issued before November 15, 2024
spa.note: Part of DreamFolks membership; not available with Priority Pass

noCostEMI.note: Available at select merchants during promotional offers

conversionFee.note: 2.99% capped at ₹299 + 18% GST on Instant EMI

emiOnCallFee.note: Up to 2% processing fee on EMI on Call transactions

preclosureFee.note: Up to 3% on principal outstanding plus interest on upcoming unbilled EMI

emi.note: GST of 18% applicable on interest component of EMIs

balanceTransfer.note: Balance transfer facility available; terms vary based on offers

memberships.name: Priority Pass
memberships.condition: For cards issued on or after November 15, 2024
memberships.note: Complimentary Priority Pass membership for primary cardholder

memberships.name: DreamFolks DragonPass
memberships.note: Includes 2 international lounge visits and 2 spa sessions

airAccident.condition: Card must be used at least once in 60 days prior to the event; international travel only; tickets must be purchased using the card
airAccident.insurer: ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company Limited
airAccident.cardStatusRequirement: Card must be active within 90 days of loss

lostCardLiability.condition: From 2 days prior to reporting and up to 7 days after reporting the loss
lostCardLiability.note: Credit Shield Cover / Zero Liability Protection

baggageDelay.condition: Delay in receipt of checked-in baggage in excess of 12 hours

counterfeitCardLiability.note: Protection against unauthorized usage of counterfeit cards

accountTakeoverCover.note: Protection if personal information is accessed or misused by third party without consent

addOnCardInsurance.note: Supplementary cardholders are not eligible for insurance benefits

claimProcess.insurer: ICICI Lombard General Insurance Co. Ltd.
claimProcess.note: All claim queries must be directed to ICICI Lombard; ICICI Bank not responsible for claim processing

insurance.note: Insurance coverage subject to terms and conditions of ICICI Lombard. Outstanding minimum balance must be cleared to avail insurance.

chipEnabled.note: Embedded microchip for enhanced security against counterfeiting

upiLinking.restrictions: P2M transactions only; P2P, IPO, mutual funds, cash withdrawal not allowed
upiLinking.note: RuPay variant supports UPI on Credit Card

autopay.note: Auto-debit from ICICI Bank Savings Account on payment due date

threeDSecure.note: Register on ICICI Bank official website for 3D Secure

upgradesFrom.note: Upgrade available based on relationship and spend history
Upgrade available based on relationship and spend history

upgradesTo.cardName: ICICI Bank Emeralde Private Metal Credit Card

upgradePathway.note: Upgrades based on spend history, relationship value (DIV), and bank's discretion; email to creditcard@icicibank.com to request upgrade

meta.bestFor: Frequent travelers (domestic & international) with ₹6+ lakh annual card spend who can leverage lounge access, golf privileges, and movie offers
meta.notRecommendedFor: Low spenders (< ₹6 lakh annually), users seeking high reward rates, users who prefer cashback over points
meta.verdict: ICICI Sapphiro is a mid-range premium card with strong lifestyle benefits including lounge access, golf, and movie offers. The reward rate (0.5% domestic) is below average, but welcome vouchers worth ₹13,000+ offset the ₹6,500 joining fee. Best value comes from meeting spend thresholds for lounge access and annual fee waiver. The dual card option (Mastercard + AmEx) provides additional flexibility. Not ideal for pure reward seekers.
pros: 4 domestic lounge visits per quarter (with ₹75K spend)
Up to 4 complimentary golf rounds per month
Buy 1 Get 1 movie offer twice monthly
Annual fee waiver on ₹6 lakh spend
cons: No reward points on fuel transactions
Supplementary cards excluded from lounge and insurance
MovieBookMyShow offer to require ₹25K spend from Jan 2026

alternatives.reason: Lower fees with similar benefits for lower spenders
Better reward rate and transfer partners
Superior reward rate and transfer partners for travelers
Lower forex markup and better movie benefits

dataSource: ICICI Bank MITC document dated Dec 12, 2025

changelog.change: Domestic lounge access requires ₹75,000 quarterly spend (effective Jan 1, 2025)
Priority Pass membership for new cardholders; spend threshold criteria updated
Caps introduced on rewards for utility, insurance, and grocery spends
BookMyShow offer to require ₹25,000 quarterly spend
Wallet load fee of 1% on ₹5,000+ transactions; Transportation spend cap introduced
